var_fa_ann.description: Array of variant functional assay annotation records

Variant Annotation ID.description: Unique ID number for each variant/drug annotation

Variant/Haplotypes.description: dbSNP rsID or haplotype(s) involved in the association. May also contain gene phenotype groups like 'poor metabolizers' or 'intermediate activity'

Gene.description: HGNC symbol for the gene involved in the association. Variants typically within gene boundaries but may be upstream affecting gene expression

Drug(s).description: The drug(s) involved in the association. Multiple drugs may apply individually or in combination (see 'Multiple drugs And/or' field)

PMID.description: PubMed identifier for the article supporting the annotation

Significance.description: The significance of the association as stated by the author

Notes.description: Free text field for notes added by the curator

Sentence.description: The structured annotation sentence generated by the variant annotation tool based on curator information

Alleles.description: The basis for comparison in the annotation. May contain variant(s), haplotype(s), genotype(s), or diplotype(s). Blank if gene phenotype in 'Variant/Haplotypes' field

Specialty Population.description: Any special populations this annotation is relevant to (e.g. pediatric)

Assay type.description: Information about the type of assay performed

Metabolizer types.description: Gene phenotype group if applicable (e.g., 'poor metabolizers'). Used when association is based on gene phenotype groups

isPlural.description: Grammar field to maintain proper sentence structure

Is/Is Not associated.description: Indicates whether or not an association was found

Direction of effect.description: Descriptor of the 'Functional terms' field indicating direction of functional effect

Functional terms.description: The functional phenotype measured in the association. Connects variant and drug in the sentence (e.g., 'activity of', 'expression of', 'inhibition of')

Gene/gene product.description: HGNC gene symbol for the gene (product) being measured by the functional assay. If present, should match the gene in the 'Gene' field

When treated with/exposed to/when assaye.description: Connection words between sentence parts (e.g., 'when assayed with', 'when exposed to', 'due to')

Multiple drugs And/or.description: 'or' means association applies to each drug individually; 'and' means association applies to drug combination

Cell type.description: The type of cell in which the assay was conducted. Free text field

Comparison Allele(s) or Genotype(s).description: Indicates allele(s)/haplotype(s)/genotype(s) that were directly compared against those in 'Variant/Haplotypes' field

Comparison Metabolizer types.description: Indicates gene phenotype groups that were directly compared against those in 'Metabolizer types' field
